ingredients: 1⁄2 lb. thick-cut bacon, cut into 1⁄2-inch pieces
Salt and freshly ground pepper, to taste
4 slices brioche, each 3⁄4 inch thick, lightly browned
4 slices brioche, each 3⁄4 inch thick, lightly browned
2 heads frisée, cored, leaves torn into 3-inch pieces
Chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley for garnish
